val:
You are free to create covers, remixes, etc. based on my piano tutorials, sheet music, or MIDI/audio files. You may also use the audio from my videos as background music for your own videos. Please credit my channel if at all possible.

Example:

Arrangement by Pianobin
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/pianobin

Have any questions?

The best way to reach me is through email: shoji AT pianobin.com.

You can also message me privately through Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram although I check these websites less frequently.

I am open to collaborations, commissions, and other arrangement-related freelance work.
